title: FUTURE ENERGY ASIA EXHIBITION & CONFERENCE 2020
description: In its next edition held in Bangkok from 12-14 February 2020, Future Energy Asia Exhibition & Conference (FEA 2020) will present a hybrid business platform that brings together the region’s most influential energy players across the complete energy value chain in one unique meeting place. Endorsed by the Ministry of Energy of Thailand, FEA 2020 looks to set the stage for NOCs and IOCs; power producers and utility companies; clean-tech providers; service companies and engineering contractors to foster a secure, affordable and low-carbon energy mix across Asia. The annual global exhibition and conference is dedicated to advancing future energy solutions for the region and will host over 150+ exhibitors from 9 countries/ regions, 4,000+ trade professional representations from over 50+ countries, 1000+ conference delegates and 200+ industry speakers. As the leading oil, gas, LNG, power generation and renewables exhibition and conference in Asia, the annual event will act as a global platform for solution providers from across the world to present their products, services and solutions focused on moving the Asian energy transformation story forward towards a cleaner, greener, modern and sustainable future. Be part of the movement. Find out more at www.futureenergyasia.com.
start_date: 12 กุมภาพันธ์ 2563
end_date: 14 กุมภาพันธ์ 2563
ticket: ไม่มีค่าเข้าชม
